Text:
Damnit, I didn't say do that! It's an easy job you
fools, just work up a riot!

Easy jobs always have a catch... If you don't know
that, you really are hopeless!

Time to play the last movement... Time for the
grand finale!

Damnit, she's a decoy! The other finalist is
taking us out separately!
You noticed too late.
Ah! You're that writer...

It's time to put a period on the last sentence of
this drama.

Ugh! Damnit...! If we gotta retreat, I'm takin' you
with me...!
Huh? Me?

Director Luna of Mitsugoshi! If I can take you out of
the picture then it'll be mission complete!
S-Stop that! Let go of me!
Oh, that's...!
Oh, that's...!
What the...?! Oh...!!!
Noooo, my tower!
Wh-Whoa, the tower! Aaagggh!!!

Urk... You didn't need to make our enemies eat my
tower before I got a chance to let Master Shadow eat
it!

That's exactly why I said it's dangerous... It's too
reckless to let them take clumsy Gamma hostage...

I-It couldn't hurt you two to be a little worried
about me...!

I'll listen to your complaints later. Quick, lend me
your ear...
Hmm, I see... Okay, as you wish.

Ladies and gentlemen! Tell me, how was the Chocolate
Hero Show?!

Oooh, so that's what it was? It was like a real
attack...

Everyone, please give a big round of applause to how
Mitsugoshi's chocolate power completely routed the
Evil Granulated Faction!

Don't give me that nonsense about a show! Look at my
clothes! There is chocolate everywhere!

Yes, we pulled off quite the surprise, I am deeply
sorry that we could not give advance warning.

If anyone has clothing or property that got messy,
we will let you exchange them for anything you
want at Mitsugoshi!
Oh? Really? Well if that's the case...

It was really thrilling, but I'm glad no one got
hurt.
Yes, both the performance and action were amazing!

(More than that, I escaped having to choose anyone!
Yeah, I got through it!)
Phew, somehow the Valentine event finished safely...
Now, you lot. Which company hired you?

...I ain't gonna sing. It's all about trust in the
merc world.

Is that so? That isn't what I heard you say earlier.
You thought it was an easy job to cause an uproar
and then run, right?
That's...um.

Well, I am not interested in who it is. You can tell
your employer that.

You tell them, next time come at us as a business and
play fair.

Master Shadow, finally... Please tell us whose
chocolate you choose. Mine or Epsilon's.

No, I can't decide that since I didn't eat Epsilon's
chocolate...

I thought you'd say that, so I'm in the middle of
building a mini chocolate tower in the Shadow
Garden kitchen.

(I thought I had an escape route, but then a
mini-tower fell on it!)

Come on, you two. Shadow had a tough day at the
event as well, let him rest.
Alpha...

Moreover, it is not just the two of you that wants to
give chocolate to Shadow. Going behind the others'
backs is forbidden.
Huh?

All of the Seven Shadows will make chocolate here,
and give it to Shadow.
But that's... But I worked so hard...!
That's completely different to what I had planned...!
Is that clear?
Y-Yes, ma'am.

(Whoa, scary! No one can disobey this side of
Alpha...)
Done! Fruit chocolate!

Didn't you just cut some fruit and stuff a bar of
cooking chocolate between them?

Err... I don't like really sweet chocolate. So that's
why it's more fruit than chocolate!

Could you at least wash the fruit? You don't want to
give Master Shadow a stomachache.
Beta...my....original seasoning...how was it?

The judges didn't care for it... It's a delicious
powder, but it might be too salty.

Sweet and delicious...hmm. Maybe, a chocolate jelly
pack...that can efficiently supply sugar...?

Your ideas place too much emphasis on efficiency and
lack in presentation...

Epsilon, I wonder if you could show me how to make
chocolate?
Ulp, Me? Show Lady Alpha? Too scary...

Everyone recognizes your cooking skill. Here, you
could be everyone's teacher.

Teacher...! Th-Then with your permission! Ahem, the
temperature has to be—

I don't understand why you put it in hot water to
begin with. It would be much faster if you just put
it into a pot— Owwww!!!

Because you will burn the pot! It is so that it
melts smoothly at a low temperature! Gamma!
Don't make your own original recipes!

(Everyone is busy and noisy, but it looks like
they're having a lot of fun.)

(Delta has Zeta helping her, and Gamma has Epsilon as
well as Alpha. I don't think anyone is going to make any
big mistakes.)

(If the chocolate is from everyone, then I don't need
to choose someone. It's a good thing that it seems
like I can get through this in peace.)
(Next year, Master Shadow...)
(The first chocolate you get will be mine...!)
(...Next year will be fine, right?)
